control.visible: [Container.Content(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(trailers) + String.Contains(skin.string(moviesfanart),extra) | Container.Content(tvshows) + String.Contains(skin.string(tvshowsfanart),extra) | Container.Content(musicvideos) + String.Contains(skin.string(musicvideosfanart),extra) | Container.Content(sets) + String.Contains(skin.string(setsfanart),extra)] + Skin.HasSetting(use_folderarts) + ![ListItem.IsParentFolder | String.StartsWith(ListItem.Path,plugin) | String.StartsWith(ListItem.Path.pvr)]

control.label: RmdR: $INFO[Window(home).Property(RecommendedMovie.1.Rating)] RndR: $INFO[Window(home).Property(RandomMovie.1.Rating)] RecR: $INFO[Window(home).Property(RecentMovie.1.Rating)] LI rating: $INFO[Container(510).ListItem.property(videorating)] LI codec: $INFO[Container(510).ListItem.property(videocodec)]
Window Is NOT Radio property IS radio
VPlayer Has EPG w remain time: $INFO[PVR.EpgEventRemainingTime]
Player time $INFO[Player.Time] Player Time Remaining $INFO[Player.TimeRemaining] Player Duration$INFO[Player.Duration]
PVR TS start $INFO[PVR.TimeshiftStart] TS End $INFO[PVR.TimeshiftEnd] TS Cur $INFO[PVR.TimeshiftCur] TS Offset $INFO[PVR.TimeshiftOffset]
PVR TS Prog Dur $INFO[PVR.TimeshiftStartProgressDuration] TS Prog Strt Tm $INFO[PVR.TimeshiftProgressStartTime] TS Prog End Tm $INFO[PVR.TimeshiftProgressEndTime]
LI Dur min: $INFO[ListItem.Duration(mins)] | LI Dur HH:MM: $INFO[ListItem.Duration(HH:MM)] | Prop set.run : $INFO[Window(home).Property(SkinInfo.Set.Movies.Runtime)]
Sys cur ctrl: $INFO[System.CurrentControl] / Sys Cur CtrlID: $INFO[System.CurrentControlId]

C Con: $INFO[Container.Content] - C View: $INFO[Container.Viewmode]$INFO[Container.Viewcount, - VCnt: ]$INFO[Container.NumItems, - Items ]$INFO[Container.NumAllItems, - AllItems ]$INFO[Container.NumNonFolderItems, - NFItems ]
